short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preparing images for the web should be a quick process. We want to make it quick. 

 Note: many more features are coming.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the up-most consideration to providing a user friendly design, we present to you the perfect solution for compressing your images.

I'm a photographer, and I get annoyed at the time it takes to open up Photoshop just to compress a picture. The solution? -- LIO. LIO is a lightweight batch image optimizer.

I want to help others be able to spend more time editing, and less time preparing pictures for the web. Right now LIO can only compress pictures, but in future releases it will be able downsize, sharpen, and apply minor adjustments to pictures.
